full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 195 of 247 323 LBUCmax5 Jane - direct
1 Q. On that trip in New Mexico, was there ever a time when someone came into your room?
2 A. Yes.
3 Q. Can you describe to the jury what you remember about that?
4 A. I just remember someone, at one point, just came into the room and said Jeffrey wants to see you and then escorted me to see him.
5 Q. When that person came into your room and told you that he wanted to see you, how did you feel?
6 A. I just, as usual, felt, like, my heart sink into my stomach, you know.
7 Q. And why was your heart sinking into your stomach?
8 A. Because I did not want to go see him.
9 Q. What's the next thing you remember about that?
10 A. I just remember being led to his bedroom and, you know, the same thing would happen.
11 Q. Who was the person who came into your room to tell you that Epstein wanted to see you?
12 A. I don't know.
13 Q. During that trip to New Mexico, was your bedroom in the same building as Epstein and Maxwell's bedrooms?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. When you traveled with Epstein and Maxwell, was there ever a time when you had trouble getting on a flight?
16 A. Yes.
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00011967
